lead_paragraph: Just days ahead of the Olympic Games the waterways of Rio de Janeiro are as filthy as ever, contaminated with raw human sewage teeming with dangerous viruses and bacteria, according to a 16-month-long study commissioned by The Associated Press.

headline.print_headline: Expert to Rio Athletes: 'Don't Put Your Head Under Water'
headline.main: Expert to Rio Athletes: 'Don't Put Your Head Under Water'

snippet: Just days ahead of the Olympic Games the waterways of Rio de Janeiro are as filthy as ever, contaminated with raw human sewage teeming with dangerous viruses and bacteria, according to a 16-month-long study commissioned by The Associated Press....
